cause.description:
The National Peace Corps Association -- the nation's leading nonprofit organization supporting supporting Returned Peace Corps Volunteers and the Peace Corps community -- is honored to play a significant role in the 50th Anniversary of the Peace Corps. This milestone celebrates the Peace Corps community’s accomplishments and gives us all an opportunity to reflect on how each one of us can continue to exemplify the Peace Corps mission and spirit.
Connect with us at http://www.peacecorpsconnect.org!
1. Starting in 2011 NPCA will hold a number of educational and celebratory events to coincide with Peace Corps’ 50th Anniversary.
2. Donate $50 for the 50th and lend a helping hand to the community!
cause.mission: Celebrate the 50th Anniversary of the Peace Corps with the largest community of former and serving Peace Corps Volunteers and Peace Corps enthusiasts!
